directions: Heat Green Giant® Cheddar & Bacon Mashed Cauliflower according to package directions.
Stir sour cream into Green Giant® Cheddar & Bacon Mashed Cauliflower.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) package Green Giant® Cheddar & Bacon Mashed Cauliflower
1/4 cup non-fat Greek yogurt or sour cream
title: Loaded Cauliflower Mash
